title: Get Element from String List
description:
LIST_GET delivers the item at the position POS from a list. The list consists
of Strings (elements) that begin with the separation character SEP. The
frst element of the list has the position 1.
name: LIST_GET

input.name: SEP
input.description: The separator used to delimit elements in the input string list.

input.name: POS
input.description: The position of the element to be retrieved from the list (0-based index).

output.name: LIST_GET
output.description: The output string containing the retrieved element from the input list based on the specified position.

in/out.name: LIST
in/out.description: The input/output string list from which the element will be retrieved.

return_value.description: Returns the string representation of the element at the specified position in the list.
